overview: Beatrice. A woman alone, dressed in rags who had a style, lying on the floor of a cashier. She gets up, leaves, walking in front of the shops and tourist sites in the city center.  Àlex. One man, one also tries to remember. But only sees images of a film. It looks like a documentary. In it, he reveals moments of a marginal life but not unhappy. In the documentary is not indigent.  He has filmed this documentary would not have done ...
title: Beatriz Barcelona
